DELETE FROM parcel_trace WHERE parcel_id = #{mainId}
SELECT * FROM parcel_trace WHERE parcel_id = #{mainId} ORDER BY scan_time DESC
INSERT IGNORE INTO parcel_trace(id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, parcel_id, scan_time, scan_type, description, description_en) VALUES
( UUID(), 'jt api', NOW(), 'jt api', NOW(), #{trace.parcelId}, #{trace.scanTime}, #{trace.scanType}, #{trace.descriptionCn}, #{trace.descriptionEn} )
INSERT INTO parcel_trace(id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, parcel_id, scan_time, scan_type, description_en, trace_location, trace_status, trace_code) VALUES
( UUID(), 'eq api', NOW(), 'eq api', NOW(), #{trace.parcelId}, #{trace.traceDateTime}, #{trace.scanType}, #{trace.traceContent}, #{trace.traceLocation}, #{trace.traceStatus}, #{trace.traceKind} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE scan_type = values(scan_type), UPDATE_TIME = NOW()

INSERT INTO parcel_trace_delete (id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, parcel_id, scan_time, scan_type, description, description_en, trace_location, trace_status, trace_code) VALUES
( #{trace.id}, #{trace.createBy}, #{trace.createTime}, #{trace.updateBy}, #{trace.updateTime}, #{trace.parcelId}, #{trace.scanTime}, #{trace.scanType}, #{trace.description}, #{trace.descriptionEn}, #{trace.traceLocation}, #{trace.traceStatus}, #{trace.traceCode} ) ;
